title: Client crashing multiple times aday (6-10 times a day for past 3 weeks)
body: I've repaired my client 10 times in past 6 days, trying to fix my client. I think that Riot hasn't noticed the bug, or maybe they are fixing it in 6.9, but it's been getting annoying as hell. I've lost so much LP, and all because of a little tiny bug that hasn't been fixed. HELP PLEASE

replies.body:
Can you provide a little more information about when your client is crashing? For example, if your client crashes every time you try to go to the store, whenever a teamfight happens, 50% of the time when you message someone, etc. etc.

Also, if you're getting any sort of error message, that'd be super helpful to know as well!

Once we get a few more details, we'll be able to take a look and have a better understanding of what's going on :)

I'm getting this as well, but mine just started after the new patch. I get an error message stating,

"There was an error processing the message from the server; this may  be caused by a number of issues, so it is recommended that you restart your client. If this continues, please contact player support etc"
My client crashes randomly during champ select, while I'm doing runes/masteries, while I'm looking in the store, and just watching the Youtube videos on the home page

Any error messages you get would help as well.  Crashing could mean many things, depending on what's happening.  Could be a Windows error, PvP.net disconnections, etc.  Screenshots of the error itself is usually just the fastest way to see what's going on.

If it's disconnecting you from anything before jumping into a game, I'd say that it's likely some form of error that's a result of an instability in the connection between your computer and our servers.   If that's the case, then I'd recommend checking out our [Connection Troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

If you can get us a screenshot of the actual error that pops up, that'd help the most in identifying the specific cause.
